        }
         else if(playerLevel[17] >= 40 && actionTimer != 0){

item.title: Timers on objects
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Hey guys,

I’m using a Devolution 7.0 server source and I’m currently wondering how to add an action timer to an object.
Here is an example:

[code] if (objectID == 2561 && objectX == 2555 && objectY == 3092) {
if(playerLevel[17] >= 40){
addSkillXP(45,17);

        }
         else {
            sendMessage("You need 40 thieving to steal from this stall");
        }
    }

[/code]
All help is appreciated

Thanx!

Read full topic
